website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, well-constructed pair of skates that are made for experienced skaters who like to go fast.
pros: Wheels roll over debris or bumpy surfaces with ease
cons: Some report that the inner liner isn't durable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These blades are comfortable, FAST, smooth, sturdy, and handle well, which I know some people have fears about regarding tri-skates. Yes, you'll be standing taller than if on 4 regular 80mm blades, but the wheelbase is pretty much identical making agility a non-issue. Be safe!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Podruchny III

customer_reviews.title: Great blades but the inner liner won't last more than 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The inner liner is falling apart or ripping on both blades after 6 weeks of daily use. For such a high price compared to my 4 wheel blades, I would have expected a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudomizer

customer_reviews.title: Tighter turns!
customer_reviews.text: Saw an article in the WSJ for a redesigned rollerblade. I have gone through about 4 pairs with a smaller 4th wheel. Figured it would work great without it. It does! I do not like the lacing system or the soft boot. Still a 5 star ride.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great skate and it fit comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several roller blade and so far this one fit me best. It is comfortable and light. Also, it gives me full control and I can wear it all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Hmoov Ntuj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. The larger wheels decrease the chance of stumbling due to cracks in pavement. First day on the skates I struggled with balance. Not sure if it’s the 110 or the 3 wheels. Most likely the 20 years of not riding. Balance is great now and speed is good. Great exercise and not as boring as running.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money....
customer_reviews.text: The 3WD skates are ok. 2 complaints I have is the boot is not stiff enough. Then the skate makes a creak sound between the boot and where the skate rails are mounted. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Rollerblade Macroblade 100 3WD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skate too big which is hard for me to give an accurate review. I haven't stayed in a long time and when I put the skates on didn't realize the lack of balance was due to wrong fit. These skates are really fast and you are relatively high in them being 100mm tri-skates. My number 1 advice is NOT TO SIZE UP!!! The soft boot doesn't give you too much support if you make a sizing mistake like I did. If you're new or coming back to skating after years of not skating I wouldn't recommend these skates... more for intermediate and advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Top buckle sucks
customer_reviews.text: It's important that your feet and ankles are super secure in order to avoid injury while skating. These top buckles are not that great when it comes to tightening them. I'll have a bunch of slack still when I want it more tight. I press on their lil push mechanism and try and Jam the plastic piece in, but it won't go any further. I've skated about 35 miles since I got them in the mail on Tuesday, and yah, that's my biggest beef with them. Not too confident in the back break either.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Half size down from your sneaker size
customer_reviews.text: If you wear an 11.5 US-size standard width sneaker, you want an 11 in Rollerblade brand skates.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fairly new roller blader but these are totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates... I am using them to chang up my excercises for losing weight and the are using muscles I haven't used in 10 years. I was so sore after using them a couple times but I'm getting used to the now and I am now having fun with my kids!
customer_reviews.author: christine gard

customer_reviews.title: The size chart is WAY OFF!!! 24cm is not a size 6.
customer_reviews.text: The size chart is WAY off!!! 24cm is not a size 6. The skate is made well. I’d order it again hopefully in the correct size. I gave 4 stars because it was too small for me to try out, but the quality is good at least.
customer_reviews.author: Made up my mind

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance and value!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to not like about these! Super smooth and really quick. One of the best Values with all the research I did. Glad I made the move to 3WD!
customer_reviews.author: Troy van Belle

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I matched against my regular shoe size and fits well. It feels very fast and I love the wheels. Very quiet and good traction. Looks better in person than in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth. First pro blades for me, and I love them. They glide very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: They suck!
customer_reviews.text: Well I can't get past the inability to tighten the top strap to it's full potential. It's impossible and it makes these skates useless for me. I don't feel comfortable doing any technical moves because I'm so unstable. These skate are horrible. DO NOT BUY!!! Does anybody want to buy these off me right now 50$. Nice paperweights I guess. Great job rollerblade QC must have busy with these. 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: alex g steiner

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth ride! Comfortable ! Like skating on clouds !!!😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Free is three
customer_reviews.text: Simple smooth light and fast. A brand new day and way to move!!!! Get going ... Ken Freeh is Three
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: was going to return but found extra padding in the foot. glad i did not have to. these are nice!
customer_reviews.author: lortiz99

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Fit well, very comfortable and excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Mau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blades. I just loved them soooo much. They run fast, smooth and secure. Really stable
customer_reviews.author: Kemersom Silva

customer_reviews.title: Blades of Glory!
customer_reviews.text: True to size fit. Product description is accurate. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the beginning of the summer (after using my old pair for roughly 10 years) and these blades are awesome!! I transitioned from 4-wheel blades to these 3-wheeled pair and it was the best decision I've ever made! It does take a little bit of time to get used to them, since you are higher off the ground (bigger wheels than the average 4-wheel blades) and have a wider turning radius (not as easy to do spins/turns on a dime), however, once you get comfortable in them, you will be cruising through the streets all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Comport that makes him fun and happy
customer_reviews.text: My son, who was an inline speed skater, quit 4 years ago due to a sore foot. This product is so comfortable that he rode for 7 hours. from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. My son won't be a skater again but I'm glad he enjoyed skating happily. I'm glad I've brought happiness back to my son, who was frustrated by the COVID 19. Thank you, the designers who design this, Rollerblade, sellers, and Amazon for organizing this happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Park

customer_reviews.title: 1 Less wheel then my house isn't a bad thing at all!! Yeet!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about getting back into the blade life until I strapped these three wheeled chariots of fire on my feet I couldn't help but notice how well these sob's go with my favorite pair of cutoff jorts! As I whipped around the lake with my fanny pack on, mullet gracefully whipping the back of my cutoff skynyrd tshirt it was almost effortless to glide at a quick steady pace. I was going so fast a whole Marlboro red would only last me a few good puffs!! One less wheel than my house but I'd say these things are more valuable then the 460 bigblock that's in the bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Roberts

product_meta.title: Rollerblade Macroblade 100 3WD Men's Adult Fitness Inline Skate, Anthracite and Neon Yellow, Performance Inline Skates
product_meta.description: Macroblade 100 3WD is designed for experienced male skaters and racers. Higher boot cuff design for superior lateral support paired with a 3x100 set-up creates greater velocity for intermediate to advanced levels; brake is standard. 100mm Supreme wheels with SG9 bearings, high-quality engineered mesh uppers and a secure buckle/strap closure system with speed lacing make this an easy choice for serious skating with a full height boot.
feature_bullets: 3 WHEEL DRIVE (3WD) HIGH PERFORMANCE - Increased lateral support for faster skating and enhanced stability while training
FLEX & LATERAL SUPPORT - Higher cuff provides added security for balance and secure foot hold
ATHLETIC SHOE ENGINEERED MESH UPPER -Breathability and comfort padding in the tongue/ankle areas with aluminum buckle, power strap and speed-lace closure
3WD TWINBLADE ALUMINUM FRAME - Sturdy 274mm/10.8” frame with lower-profile design for increased speed and maneuverability
ROLLERBLADE SUPREME WHEELS - 100mm/85A wheels and SG9 bearings reduce wear and maximize speed

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
